cleaned_text: to Understanding Chronic Inflammation](https://holisticprimarycare.net/topics/chronic-disease/neurotransmitter-testing-holds-keys-to-understanding-chronic-inflammation/) Clinically, we blame most chronic diseases on inflammation. Yet the ways we diagnose, measure, and monitor diseases associated with inflammation-including heart disease and cancer- have not evolved to a truly clinically useful level. By looking upstream at neurotransmitter levels, we can gain important information about what's really happening with our patients.
